document_data.mainbody:
Blades and Bardings was a ballad from the Sword Coast region, composed sometime in or before the mid 14 century DR.
Blades and Bardings, its sheet music, and lyrics, all were recored in the book simply titled Sword Coast Songbook, compiled by Silke Rosena. The book was made available for purchase in the city of Baldurs Gate in or before the late 15 century DR.
